Header: Special bus services to function for New Year
Content: Special bus services will function to ease transport for people who are visiting hometowns during this Sinhala and Tamil New Year season.1500 buses have been allocated for the convenient of the commuters who are visiting hometowns and those who return from hometowns to the city during the Sinhala and Tamil New Year season. The service will be for the period of 8th to 18th April. Apart from these special services, the usual day-to-day bus services will also function.
